name: Free Weekly, Daily Planners
description: Plan your Week and Days in NotionThese digital planners are designed to help you map out your weeks and days so that you can make the most of your time.What's Included?Weekly PlannerDaily PlannerFAQsHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.Does this work on the free version of Notion?Yes, all you need is a free plan.Still have questions?Send your feedback or questions to brian@blackwatchco.io
